givenName.description: First name(s), other name(s), or secondary identifier, of the licence holder.

lastName.description: Last name, surname, or primary identifier, of the licence holder.

issuingCountry.description: Country code as alpha 2 code, defined in ISO 3166-1, which issued the mDL or within which the licensing authority is located.

issuingAuthority.description: Name of licensing authority, or issuing country if separate licensing authorities have not been authorized.

documentNumber.description: The number assigned or calculated by the issuing authority.

birthDate.description: Day, month, year on which the licence holder was born. If unknown, approximate.

gender.description: Licence holder's gender: M for male, F for female, X for not specified

height.description: A Licence holder's height in centimetres.

weight.description: A Licence holder's weight in kilograms O F3N uint

residentAddress.description: The place where the licence holder resides and/or may be contacted (street/house number, municipality etc.)

portrait.description: A reproduction of the licence holder's portrait.
